mapper.select: select Code_ID codeID,Restaurant_ID restaurantID,Restaurant_Title title,Restaurant_Location location, Restaurant_Rating rating, Restaurant_Time time, Restaurant_Contents contents,Restaurant_Tel tel from tbl_restaurant where Restaurant_ID = #{restaurantID}

select Code_ID codeID,Restaurant_ID restaurantID,Restaurant_Title title,Restaurant_Location location, Restaurant_Rating rating, Restaurant_Time time, Restaurant_Contents contents,Restaurant_Tel tel from tbl_restaurant where Restaurant_ID > 0 order by Restaurant_ID desc limit #{startNum}, #{contentsPerPage}
select count(Restaurant_ID) from tbl_restaurant where Restaurant_ID > 0
